mark_primary.instruction: First, let's identify the core fields. For each of the following, draw a box on the image.

help.title: Drawing boxes
help.body: Draw a box around each of the fields.

mark_secondary.instruction: Great! Now, click on the image to place a marker next to each of the following.

help.title: Mark secondary fields
help.body: Place a point on the image by single-clicking with your mouse or tapping once on device.

mark_valuation.instruction: Great! Place a point next to each of the valuation dates. Valuations occur toward the bottom of the form and include an assessment date and dollar value.

help.title: Valuations
help.body: Place a point on the image next to the date of any valuations that are recorded at the bottom of the form. Valuations consist of a date and a dollar amount. For example: "1879 November Valuation of premises $1200".
